sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'
import {useGoBack} from '../../../Hooks/app'
import {useOfferingOrderInOfferPage} from '../../../Hooks/order'
import {
    useOfferingDetail,
    useOfferingGallery,
    useOfferingsCharacs,
    useOfferingSpecIdPush
} from '../../../Hooks/offerings'
import {AuthModal} from '../../../UIComponents/AuthModal'
import {Gallery, OfferingCharacteristics, OfferingInfo, OfferSpecialists} from '../organisms'
import {RootContent} from '../../../UIComponents/GlobalStyles'
import {FixedHeader} from '../../../Components/FixedHeader'
import {Col, Row} from 'antd'
import {ProductInfoContentWrapper} from '../atoms'
import {OfferingDescription} from '../organisms/offering-description'

export const OfferingPage = () => {
    useOfferingGallery()
    useOfferingsCharacs()
    useOfferingSpecIdPush()
    const {organization, offering_id} = useParams()
    const {res, isLoading} = useOfferingDetail(offering_id)
    const {handleRequest, setOpenModal, openModal} = useOfferingOrderInOfferPage()
    
    const {goBack} = useGoBack({
        pathname: `/${organization}/offerings`
    })
    
    
    return (
        <RootContent paddingTop={50} height='100vh'>
            <AuthModal
                modalIsOpen={openModal}
                onCancel={() => setOpenModal(false)}
                action={handleRequest}
            />
            <FixedHeader
                title={res?.data?.organization?.name}
                goBack={goBack}
            />
            <Row gutter={[0, 12]}>
                <Col span={24}>
                    <Gallery/>
                </Col>
                <Col span={24}>
                    <ProductInfoContentWrapper>
                        <Row gutter={[0, 12]}>
                            <Col span={24}>
                                <OfferingInfo
                                    loading={isLoading}
                                    name={res?.data?.name}
                                    cost={res?.data?.cost}
                                    qty={res?.data?.qty}
                                />
                            </Col>
                            <Col span={24} className='container'>
                                <OfferSpecialists/>
                            </Col>
                            <Col span={24}>
                                <OfferingDescription description={res?.data?.description} loading={isLoading}/>
                            </Col>
                            <Col span={24}>
                                <OfferingCharacteristics/>
                            </Col>
                        </Row>
                    </ProductInfoContentWrapper>
                </Col>
            </Row>
        </RootContent>
    )
}
